about_the_game:
Then? Then people developed, and the wild west was no more!

What? Still won't satisfied, will you? Ok, one last tale then, one last tale.

It was back in late 19th century, the last period before industries and capital grew ever strong and took away all old wild west mysteries. Several desprite gold rushers who would not travel to Yukon stayed, hoping to find more in a depleted mine. All sorts of things they did to help their cause. But the mine seemed mysterious and something supernatural was hiding——
The game throw you into the situation that you have to complete the tasks and find out the monsters (wendigos) among you at the same time. The monsters known as wendigos are able to change its form and aim to wipe out the gold rushers. 4 to 10 players can join the same lobby and start the game.

Features:
You are devided to be gold rushers or wendigos. Within the gold rushers, there are also some special roles with extra abilities(play the game to find out) to increase the fun and uncertainty of the game. However basically what you going to do in the game is——

As gold rushers:

*complete the tasks to contribute to your cause.

*fulfill your cause or find out the wendigos to win the game.

*call for a meeting if anything suspecious happen or someone is found dead.

*vote in the meeting to determine others' fate.

*make use of your extra ability if you have.

*you can always try to be helpful, even after your death.

As Wendigos:

*try to kill as many gold rushers to win the game.

*try sabotaging to stall gold rushers.

*make best of your shape-shifting ability.

*try mislead others in the meeting.

*beware of the extra ability of specific gold rushers.


3.Customization: The characters' clothes can be customized while several characters can be chosen. And the number of players, numbers of wendigos, numbers of gold rushers with special abilities, etc can all be highly customized. Adjust these options freely to create the game pace you like.

short_description: The game allows 4 to 10 players to experience co-op and betrayal. You must comlete tasks while bewaring of the monsters among you. Whether to make best of your social deception and reasoning skills or just play it as a crazy party game is all up to you!
